channel.title: Cheng Qiliang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Cheng Qiliang's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: | About Me Undergraduate software engineering, more than six years as a code farmer, familiar with open source technologies such as OpenStack, Ceph, Kubernetes, Docker, EFK, Prometheus, Zabbix, and currently working on back-end R&D related to logging, monitoring, and alerting. My Email: qiliang.cheng@gmail.com Welcome letter exchange. GitHub Chart: | About Site This site is a personal blog hosted on GitHub Pages based on the Hugo build tool. If you feel that any article or code is inspiring, please click on Star Support.
